value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well, well...there you are, Helbindi.
It has been much too long! Wouldn't
you agree?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|You! Why, I'll—$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Now, now. No need to get all
flustered... I've come with some
good news for you, after all...$k$p$EFace|Your little sister is in a place of joy.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|A place of...joy? What's that
supposed to mean?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|A place where she is free from
suffering, spending her time without
care or worry...$k$pWould you...like to see her, Helbindi?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|...$k$pPrincess Laegjarn told me listening
to you was no good. Said you like
messing with people's minds...$k$pShe's smarter'n me by a heap and
a half, so I'd better stuff my fingers
in my ears.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|If only you had followed directions
so well before, dear, maybe your
sister would still be alive...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Tch... Damn you...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Your sister wants to see you. It'd be
a shame to keep her waiting! The love
siblings share is so beautiful a thing...$k$pEven you must have guessed by now.
I am not from Múspell, oh no. Rather,
a realm beyond...$k$pIf you know that, you know I can take
you to your sister if I so please. I can
deliver you to that joyful place...$k$pShe's been absolutely DYING to see
you for so long! The poor thing...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|All I ask in return is that you hear me
out. Just one little request...$k$pOh, but wait. Here comes a pesky
little rodent. We'll finish this later...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Helbindi! There you are! Finally
found you. Am I glad!$k$pI was so lonely I thought I might
die! ...Er, is something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Nah, forget it... It's nothing.$k$pNow, let's get out of here already.
All we gotta do is bust through this
damn vortex. Right?!$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Playtime's over. You do want to see
your little sister, don't you? All you
have to do is listen to my request...$k$pTime to make a choice, Helbindi.
What's it going to be? Spit it out!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Nope.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My, my! What a twist! May I ask why?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|I crawled out of nothing, and did
everything I could just to survive.$k$pNothing was beneath me. I killed
anyone in my way and rose up the
ranks...$k$pI could do it all because I know I'm
nothing but filth. That can only
mean one thing for sure...$k$pIf this so-called place of joy is the
kind of place my sister would end
up...$k$pThen a piece of trash like me has no
business there.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Listening to you, helping you... None
of that is gonna erase the stuff I've
done.$k$pYou think you have the power to
grant me and my sister happiness?
Like you know what I deserve?$k$pThere's no way in hell! You're a
liar. But more than that, I don't even
care if you're telling the truth.$k$pIf she's happy, that's good enough.
But me? I belong in the pits of hell.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My...I do love it when you mortals
manage to surprise me.$k$pYou've only made me want you as
my servant even more... Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Sorry, but I got no intention of
working for scum like y—$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|There you are! Phew! You keep on
disappearing... Wait for me next time!$k$pHey... Is something the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Swim19,Face|Would you pipe down already, brat?$k$pCome on, let's get out of here while
the gettin's good! Your family must
be worried sick about you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Fine, fine! Hee-hee.$k$p
